name: Don't Stop The Beet
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 52.

It's harvest day ! But getting all your fruits and vegetables by hand is boring. Let's add a beet... I mean, a beat to it and suddenly work becomes more fun !

Bugs : Timing may be off by an half beat due to an unresolved bug. In that case, check the box on the title screen.

Commands :

- Up, Down, Left, Right : Rhythm Inputs

- Escape : Pause/Resume

The team

Stan Dusk : Graphic Design, Art, Music

Nuclehon : Programming, Game Design
